DOC.detailed_description: The goal research investigate potential CSF biomarker NPH new tool diagnosis NPH prognosis VPS placement . Transforming growth factor-b1 ( TGF-b1 ) signal molecule involve three fundamental activity ; suppression cell proliferation , immunosuppression , deposition extracellular matrix promotion synthesis inhibition degradation.8 Previously , TGF-b1 implicate development communicate hydrocephalus secondary pre-term infant intraventricular hemorrhage9 adult aneurysmal sub-arachnoid hemorrhage.10 , 11 Recently , investigation demonstrate elevated level TGF-b1 patient shunt-responsive NPH compare non-NPH patients.12 The specific aim research proposal : 1 . Correlate CSF level TGF-b1 clinical response patient diagnose NPH VPS placement . 2 . Correlate CSF level TGF-b1 optimal VPS pressure setting .
